prompts: Create a water-type Pokemon that has a shell-like body and vibrant pink features.
Imagine a cute Pokemon with a bubbly personality and a soft, squishy appearance.
Show me a Pokemon with a unique aquatic design, perfect for living in wetlands.
Generate a Pokemon with pink and white coloration, ideal for a playful water environment.
Make a Pokemon that looks like it just emerged from the ocean, featuring adorable traits.
Design a Pokemon that thrives in both urban and natural habitats, with a charming look.
Give me a Pokemon that has a friendly demeanor and a shell adorned with spikes.
